scripts.start:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod node build/server.js
scripts.migrate:latest:dev: NODE_ENV=dev knex migrate:latest --knexfile src/knexfile.ts ts --env development
scripts.migrate:rollback:dev: NODE_ENV=dev knex migrate:rollback --knexfile src/knexfile.ts ts --env development
scripts.seed:make:dev: NODE_ENV=dev knex seed:make --knexfile src/knexfile.ts -x ts --env development
scripts.seed:run:dev: NODE_ENV=dev knex seed:run --knexfile src/knexfile.ts ts --env development
scripts.migrate:latest:test: NODE_ENV=test knex migrate:latest --knexfile src/knexfile.ts ts --env test
scripts.migrate:rollback:test: NODE_ENV=test knex migrate:rollback --knexfile src/knexfile.ts ts --env test
scripts.seed:make:test: NODE_ENV=test knex seed:make --knexfile src/knexfile.ts -x ts --env test
scripts.seed:run:test: NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run --knexfile src/knexfile.ts ts --env test
